titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that an unmarried individual who maintains a household shall be considered a head of household, without regard to whether the individual has a dependent who is a member of the household.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that an unmarried individual who maintains a household shall be considered a head of household, without regard to whether the individual has a dependent who is a member of the household.
